com.hazelcast.internal.util.hashslot

Interface HashSlotArray8byteKey

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Disposable, HashSlotArray
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HashSlotArray8byteKeyImpl, HashSlotArray8byteKeyNoValue

    public interface HashSlotArray8byteKey
extends HashSlotArray
    Specialization of HashSlotArray to the case where the key is a single long value and the value part is a block whose size is a multiple of 8 (including zero).

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      HashSlotCursor8byteKey cursor()
      Returns a cursor over all assigned slots in this array.
      long ensure(long key)
      Ensures that there is a mapping from the given key to a slot in the array.
      long get(long key)
      Returns the address of the value block mapped by the given key.
      boolean remove(long key)
      Removes the mapping for the given key.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.hazelcast.internal.util.hashslot.HashSlotArray

        address, capacity, clear, expansionThreshold, gotoAddress, gotoNew, size, trimToSize

      • Methods inherited from interface com.hazelcast.nio.Disposable

        dispose

    • Method Detail

      • ensure

        long ensure(long key)
        Ensures that there is a mapping from the given key to a slot in the array. The abs of the returned integer is the address of the slot's value block. The returned integer is positive if a new slot had to be assigned and negative if the slot was already assigned.
        Parameters:
        key - the key
        Returns:
        address of value block

      • get

        long get(long key)
        Returns the address of the value block mapped by the given key.
        Parameters:
        key - the key
        Returns:
        address of the value block or MemoryAllocator.NULL_ADDRESS if no mapping for key exists.

      • remove

        boolean remove(long key)
        Removes the mapping for the given key.
        Parameters:
        key - the key
        Returns:
        true if a mapping existed and was removed, false otherwise

      • cursor

        HashSlotCursor8byteKey cursor()
        Returns a cursor over all assigned slots in this array.
